version_description:
Change daily initialization time
 : Local Time -> UTC Time
Fixed an issue where the daily push compensation is late.

- Add Halloween Events
- Add New Costume
- Add new lamp
- Add new furniture
- Improvement of Main UI
Some item bug fixes

- Add new facilities
- Add new skills
- Add cat effect sound
Fixed recipe level display error related to celery material

"iPhone Settings -> Display -> When in Light Mode
Fixed a bug where images and font colors were changed"

Add a rest facility swing
Adoption of advertising
Bug fix

Memory Optimization
Minor Bug Fixed
Fixed an issue where a particular device is not progressing
Memory Optimization

Ad Optimization
Bug fix

[1.7.9 Update]
Aquarium Facility Added (Function Facility)
- Fill the aquarium with cool fishes!
  :You can store the fishes you obtained in the aquarium.

[1.8.0 Update]
- Aquarium Translation Error Fixed
- Graphic Error in Specific Facilities Fixed

[1.8.1 Update]
- Advertisement optimization 
- Other bugs fixed
- Aquarium text effect error corrected

[1.8.2 Update]
- Christmas event scheduled
- Other bugs fixed

- Cat's Friend added

- Cookbook library facility added

- Official Instagram shortcut button added
- Other bugs fixed
